Jammu: Kashmir Police denied the suspension of the SP in a tweet, stating that they were shocked to read the concocted information shared by Madhu Kishwar.
Sushil Pandit: who was mentioned as the source of the misinformation, did not have any tweet on DGP Vaid ordering the arrest of the SP involved in the Burhan Wani encounter.
Madhu Kishwar: known for circulating unverified information on Twitter, attributed the false claim to Sushil Pandit's tweet.
The expert: s verdict highlights the controversy surrounding Madhu Kishwar's tweet, accusing Chief Minister Mahbooba Mufti of being a jihadi politician and launching a personal attack on DG Vaid.
